item.title: Creating a Network Hub for Social Medias
item.description: Introduction We all see the new instagram bio link apps are getting popular and popular day by day, and They are just a simple lines of HTML and CSS even without no JS! And I totally think I can re-create this bio link page with HTML and CSS and add some JS to the taste and also add some dynamic functionalities you can use. Today we’re discussing about how I made https://bio.
